name: Broken Ship
description:
This game have been created for Ludum Dare 49 - on the theme "unstable". In my game, your goal is to prevent your ship's core to implode by bringing 30 cubes.

You have 30 seconds before the implosion, but you can reset the timer via a little transmitter behind you.

The game is available in english and en français *wink*

Asset used:

3D: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/space-kit

Sounds: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/sci-fi-sounds
